item.title: DevOps Demystified
item.description:
For a term that is not even six years old, DevOps remains a mysterious pursuit for many software engineering organizations. Let me define DevOps and help you can understand and chart your own journey to DevOps. Hint: it’s cultural!

I will elaborate and polish the slides further, but the slides really hammer the key points in an efficient manner! Please contact me with any follow up questions or comments.

The content of this blog post has been given as a talk:

  • 2015-10-03: presented at Silicon Valley Code Camp 2015 San Jose, CA
    • Slides: DevOps Demystified || Markdown
    • Nice turnout of 13 registered, 85 interested, and about 40 attendees.
    • A few tweets ensued:

"DevOps is a culturally rendered term." @calm_mark

— Noah Kantrowitz (@kantrn) October 3, 2015
